#include "commo.h"
#include "../rcc/graph.h"
#include "../rcc/graph_marshaler.h"
#include "../command.h"
#include "../procedure.h"
#include "../command_marshaler.h"
#include "raft_rpc.h"
#include "macros.h"

namespace janus {

RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr* poll) : Communicator(poll) {
}

shared_ptr<RaftVoteQuorumEvent> RaftCommo::SendRequestVote(parid_t par_id,
                                siteid_t site_id,
                                uint64_t arg1,
                                uint64_t arg2,
                                uint64_t next_index[],
                                vector<uint64_t> all_terms) {
  /*
   * Example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  int n = Config::GetConfig()->GetPartitionSize(par_id);
  auto e = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<RaftVoteQuorumEvent>(n-1, (n-1)/2);
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];

  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    siteid_t target_site_id = p.first;
    if (target_site_id == site_id) {
      continue;
    }

    uint64_t prev_log_index = next_index[target_site_id]-1;
    uint64_t prev_log_term = all_terms[prev_log_index];

    RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
    FutureAttr fuattr;
    fuattr.callback = [e, site_id, p](Future* fu) {
      uint64_t term;
      bool_t vote_granted;
      
      fu->get_reply() >> term;
      fu->get_reply() >> vote_granted;
      
      e->FeedVote(vote_granted);
      e->FeedTerm(term);
      Log_debug("[%d] Vote granted by: %d - %d", site_id, p.first, vote_granted);
      Log_debug("[%d] Term seen by: %d - %d", site_id, p.first, term);
    };
    /* Always use Call_Async(proxy, RPC name, RPC args..., fuattr)
    * to asynchronously invoke RPCs */
    Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, arg1, arg2, prev_log_index, prev_log_term, fuattr);
  }

  return e;
}

void RaftCommo::SendEmptyAppendEntriesTemp(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t site_id,
                                  uint64_t term) {
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first != site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [](Future* fu) {
        bool_t followerAppendOK;
        fu->get_reply() >> followerAppendOK;
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, EmptyAppendEntries, term, fuattr);
    }
  }
}

void RaftCommo::SendEmptyAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t target_site_id,
                                  uint64_t term) {
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  for(auto& proxy : proxies) {
    if(proxy.first == target_site_id){
      RaftProxy *raft_proxy = (RaftProxy*) proxy.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [](Future* fu) {
        bool_t followerAppendOK;
        fu->get_reply() >> followerAppendOK;
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(raft_proxy, EmptyAppendEntries, term, fuattr);
    }
  }

  return;
}


shared_ptr<RaftLogAppendEvent> RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(
                        parid_t par_id,
                         siteid_t site_id,
                         uint64_t leader_term,
                         uint64_t next_index[],
                        vector<uint64_t> all_terms,
                        vector<txid_t> all_data,
                         uint64_t leader_commit) {
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  int n = Config::GetConfig()->GetPartitionSize(par_id);
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<RaftLogAppendEvent>(n-1, (n-1)/2);
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  for(auto& proxy : proxies) {
    siteid_t target_site_id = proxy.first;
    if (target_site_id == site_id) {
      continue;
    }


    int start = next_index[target_site_id];
    vector<uint64_t> terms_for_curr = vector<uint64_t>(all_terms.begin() + start, all_terms.end());
    vector<txid_t> all_data_for_curr = vector<txid_t>(all_data.begin() + start, all_data.end());

    uint64_t prev_log_index = next_index[target_site_id]-1;
    uint64_t prev_log_term = all_terms[prev_log_index];

    RaftProxy *raft_proxy = (RaftProxy*) proxy.second;
    FutureAttr fuattr;
    fuattr.callback = [ev, target_site_id, site_id](Future* fu) {
      bool_t followerAppendOK;
      uint64_t term, next_index;
      fu->get_reply() >> term;
      fu->get_reply() >> next_index;
      fu->get_reply() >> followerAppendOK;
      Log_debug("[%d] [Inside commo Response] AppendEntries response came for: %d where incoming_term is: %d and next_index is: %d, success: %s", site_id, target_site_id, term, next_index, followerAppendOK ? "true": "false");
      ev->setAccepted(followerAppendOK);
      ev->addResult(target_site_id, followerAppendOK, term, next_index);
    };

    Log_debug("[%d] [Inside commo Request] AppendEntries request to: %d where next_index is: %d", site_id, target_site_id, next_index[target_site_id]);
    Call_Async(raft_proxy, AppendEntries, site_id, leader_term, prev_log_index, prev_log_term, terms_for_curr, all_data_for_curr, leader_commit, false, fuattr);
  }

  return ev;
}

shared_ptr<RaftLogSingleAppendEvent> RaftCommo::SendAppendEntriesNew(
                        parid_t par_id,
                         siteid_t site_id,
                         siteid_t target_site_id,
                         uint64_t leader_term,
                         uint64_t prev_log_index,
                         uint64_t prev_log_term,
                        vector<uint64_t> terms,
                        vector<txid_t> data,
                         uint64_t leader_commit,
                         bool_t paused) {
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<RaftLogSingleAppendEvent>(1, 1);
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  for(auto& proxy : proxies) {
    siteid_t proxy_id = proxy.first;
    if (target_site_id != proxy_id) {
      continue;
    }

    RaftProxy *raft_proxy = (RaftProxy*) proxy.second;
    FutureAttr fuattr;
    fuattr.callback = [ev, target_site_id, site_id](Future* fu) {
      bool_t followerAppendOK;
      uint64_t term, next_index;
      fu->get_reply() >> term;
      fu->get_reply() >> next_index;
      fu->get_reply() >> followerAppendOK;
      Log_debug("[%d] [Inside commo Response] Append entries response came for: %d where incoming_term is: %d and next_index is: %d, success: %s", site_id, target_site_id, term, next_index, followerAppendOK ? "true": "false");
      ev->setAccepted(followerAppendOK);
      ev->addResult(target_site_id, followerAppendOK, term, next_index);
    };

    Log_debug("[%d] [Inside commo Request] Append entries request to: %d where prev_log_index is: %d", site_id, target_site_id, prev_log_index);
    Call_Async(raft_proxy, AppendEntries, site_id, leader_term, prev_log_index, prev_log_term, terms, data, leader_commit, paused, fuattr);
  }

  return ev;
}


shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendString(parid_t par_id, siteid_t site_id, const string& msg, string* res) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [res,ev](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *res;
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, HelloRpc, msg, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}


} // namespace janus
